recipes.label: Rush A Ritual for Quick Power
recipes.startdescription: If I bring the right trappings to a place with the right ambiance, I could perform a ritual to give myself great power. The actions I'd take might be...peculiar, and raise the suspicion of the general public.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Winter Ritual in a Silenced Space
recipes.startdescription: I have brought my implements, and the atmosphere is charged and ready.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Winter Ritual in a Silenced Space
recipes.startdescription: The tears that anoint the bones need not be my own, but it must be my hand that buries them in the earth, and it must happen in perfect silence.
recipes.description: Music brightens, Influence blossoms. As I layer on the final crumbs on earth, they crisp with frost. All birdsong halts, besides the distant cooing lamentation of the doves.
